author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of Puducherry Makkal Porattakuzhu, stage a protest near Raj Nivas in support of their demands in Puducherry on Monday.— Photo: S.S. Kumar

As many as 80 persons owing allegiance to various outfits were arrested when they attempted to picket the Raj Nivas here on Monday demanding the government to immediately intervene and take action against a senior bureaucrat for alleged irregularities.

The agitators gathered in front of the Head Post Office and attempted to picket the Raj Nivas raising slogans against Education Secretary Ragesh Chandra.

However, they were blocked enroute by the police and arrested.
title: 80 held for trying to picket Raj Nivas
